title: "Japanese AI startup Cogent Labs nets $13m to expand in Asia"
excerpt: "Cogent Labs, an AI solutions provider based in Tokyo, announced that it has raised 1.4 billion yen (US$13 million) in a series C funding round, bringing its total funding to 4.2 billion yen (US$39 million). Aizawa-4 Limited Partnership, I Holdings, Comture Corporation, and Japan Co-Invest II Limited Partnership were the investors in the round."
